input.f90

00001 !==============================================================================!
00002 ! MODULE: input
00003 !
00008 
00009 module input
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public read_input
00014 
00015 contains
00016 
00017 !===============================================================================
00018 ! READ_INPUT
00021 
00022   subroutine read_input
00023 
00024     use global,           only: nhistories,seed,source_type,mat,emin,emax,     &
00025    &                            allocate_problem,tal,n_tallies
00026     use materials,        only: setup_material,load_source,load_isotope
00027     use tally,            only: set_user_tally,set_spectrum_tally
00028     use xml_data_input_t
00029 
00030     ! local variables
00031     logical                        :: file_exists  ! see if file exists
00032     character(255)                 :: filename     ! filename to open
00033     real(8)                        :: N            ! temp number dens
00034     real(8)                        :: A            ! temp atomic weight
00035     character(255)                 :: path         ! path to isotope file
00036     logical                        :: thermal      ! contains thermal lib
00037     integer                        :: i            ! iteration counter
00038     integer                        :: react_type   ! reaction type
00039     integer                        :: isotope=0    ! isotope for micro mult
00040     real(8), allocatable           :: Ebins(:)     ! tally energy bins
00041 
00042     ! check for input file
00043     filename = "input.xml"
00044     inquire(FILE=trim(filename), EXIST=file_exists)
00045     if (.not. file_exists) then
00046       write(*,*) 'Cannot read input file!'
00047       stop
00048     else
00049 
00050       ! tell user
00051       write(*,'(A/)') "Reading INPUT XML file..."
00052 
00053     end if
00054 
00055     ! read in input file
00056     call read_xml_file_input_t(trim(filename))
00057 
00058     ! read in settings
00059     nhistories = settings_%histories
00060     seed = settings_%seed
00061     source_type = settings_%source_type
00062     mat%nisotopes = size(material_(1)%nuclides)
00063 
00064     ! load the source
00065     call load_source(mat,source_type,settings_%source_path)
00066 
00067     ! set up the material object
00068     call setup_material(mat,emin,emax)
00069 
00070     ! begin loop over isotope materials
00071     do i = 1,mat%nisotopes
00072 
00073       ! extract info
00074       N = material_(1)%nuclides(i)%N
00075       A = material_(1)%nuclides(i)%A
00076       path = material_(1)%nuclides(i)%path
00077       thermal = material_(1)%nuclides(i)%thermal
00078 
00079       ! load the isotope into memory
00080       call load_isotope(mat,N,A,path,thermal)
00081 
00082     end do
00083 
00084     ! get size of tallies
00085     if (.not.associated(tallies_%tally)) then
00086       n_tallies = 1
00087     else
00088       n_tallies = size(tallies_%tally) + 1
00089     end if
00090 
00091     ! allocate problem
00092     call allocate_problem(n_tallies)
00093 
00094     ! begin loop over tallies
00095     do i = 1,n_tallies-1
00096 
00097       ! set reaction type
00098       select case(trim(tallies_%tally(i)%type))
00099         case('flux')
00100           react_type = 0
00101         case('absorption')
00102           react_type = 1
00103         case('scattering')
00104           react_type = 2
00105         case('micro_capture')
00106           react_type = 3
00107           isotope = tallies_%tally(i)%isotope
00108         case DEFAULT
00109           react_type = 0
00110       end select
00111 
00112       ! preallocate Ebins
00113       if(.not. allocated(Ebins)) allocate(Ebins(size(tallies_%tally(i)%Ebins)))
00114 
00115       ! set Ebins
00116       Ebins = tallies_%tally(i)%Ebins
00117 
00118       ! set up user-defined tallies
00119       call set_user_tally(tal(i),Ebins,size(Ebins),react_type,isotope)
00120 
00121       ! deallocate Ebins
00122       if(allocated(Ebins)) deallocate(Ebins)
00123 
00124     end do
00125 
00126     ! set up spectrum tally
00127     call set_spectrum_tally(tal(n_tallies),emax,emin)
00128 
00129   end subroutine read_input
00130 
00131 end module input
